info.author: Patricio Stegmann
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Operating System :: Microsoft :: Windows :: Windows NT/2000
Topic :: Multimedia :: Graphics :: Capture :: Digital Camera
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
This module allows full control over Canon digital cameras using Canon SDK
(CDSDK version 7.3 free of charge) and a class that implements the Canon device
in Python. You can control zoom, flash, take picture or view in realtime via the
viewfinder functionalities. This allows for example applications to take
portraits of persons in front of PC, or allows videosurveillance or whatever
applications related to imagery.
info.keywords: canon picture photo viewfinder control digital camera
info.name: pycanon
info.summary: Python module for driving a Canon digital camera
info.html_description: This module allows full control over Canon digital cameras using Canon SDK (CDSDK version 7.3 free of charge) and a class that implements the Canon device in Python. You can control zoom, flash, take picture or view in realtime via the viewfinder functionalities. This allows for example applications to take portraits of persons in front of PC, or allows videosurveillance or whatever applications related to imagery.
